titles.title: To require Congressional approval for implementation of a severity-adjusted inpatient prospective payment system for rural hospitals under the Medicare Program.
To require Congressional approval for implementation of a severity-adjusted inpatient prospective payment system for rural hospitals under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: Requires congressional approval for implementation of a severity-adjusted inpatient prospective payment system (PPS) for rural hospitals under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.
